p.k: Ricky accidentally mistakes his dad's new rescue ramp for a toy ramp he won from a Steel Awesome breakfast cereal contest. Hank mistakes Ricky's toy as his new rescue ramp and speeds off with it. When it's time for Hank to make a rescue, he realises he can't use Ricky's toy, leaving Ricky to save the day by getting Hank's new ramp back to his dad.
